meta.article_title: July 11, 2022 - Five Ways to Force an Opponent Out of Position

force_opponent_out_of_position.probleme: Force an opponent out of position

debutant.step: Attack middle, then wide to corners
Short to forehand, long to wide backhand, or short to backhand, long to wide forehand

exercices_complementaires.nom: Jam opponent on the other wide corner
exercices_complementaires.description: Go short to forehand, long to wide backhand, or vice versa.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Take the second wide corner quickly and wider
exercices_complementaires.description: Go to a wide corner twice in a row, taking the second one quicker and wider.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Force opponent to decide between forehand or backhand
exercices_complementaires.description: Short to middle, wide to corners. This forces the opponent to decide whether to return forehand or backhand.
